summary: The 'Saving Our Mainstreet American Locations for Leisure and Shopping Act of 2025' (Saving Our MALLS Act) amends the Internal Revenue Code of 1986 to exclude certain discharges of commercial or retail indebtedness secured by real property from income. This exclusion applies to debt incurred before March 1, 2023, and discharged between December 31, 2023, and January 1, 2028. The bill defines "qualified commercial or retail indebtedness" and specifies the requirements for the real property. It also coordinates this exclusion with other existing exclusions in the tax code and outlines the effective date.
